name: Helmet Point
description:
Helmet Point is a short 3-level platformer.

Sir Lancelot is one of the most valiant knights in the kingdom. However, in one of his many battles, his helmet is enchanted by a witch. The helmet, now blessed with life, decides he is tired of being left out of adventuring and being dismissed as a mere piece of armor. He leaves to explore the world.

In the game, you will head through three pretty difficult levels. There are power-ups, such as the Power Ore, a rainbow piece of metal that grants extreme power for a short time, and the HELLmet, which breaks reality and makes the game harder.

This game was made for My First Game Jam: Winter 2023. I had a lot of fun making it. I would like to thank lexaloffle for creating PICO-8, which is what this game is programmed in. This game may be hard, but do not fear. You can do it.

Please be aware that this is a beta of the game and may have glitches and bugs. If you find any please tell me. Once the game jam is over I will put the source code for sale on this page for $2+, so that if you like the game you can create your own levels.
